nodes.text: This individual was a male Human artist from the Castle Lands on Alderaan. He was married to Sheltay Retrac, one of Senator Bail Organa's aides.

Sometime prior to the formation of the Galactic Empire, an artist from Alderaan married fellow Alderaanian Sheltay Retrac. In 19 BBY, Retrac gave birth to their only child, Winter. A year after the Empire's creation, he and his wife died, leaving Winter under the care of Bail Organa.
Sheltay Retrac's husband was first mentioned in Star Wars Chronicles: The Prequels.
